text:
In general, that is okay.

As pages are dynamic, in 98% of cases you would not want them indexed, they are dynamic and require search terms, and the results still lead to their main location as 98% of pages are not stored under `website.tld/search/post-about-winter`  it still goes into `website.tld/blog/post-about-winter`

Reminder: HubSpot has an <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/seo/view-seo-recommendations-in-HubSpot|SEO recommendations tool> built into HubSpot that helps you track down issues and suggests changes you can make.
